io.config

Class ConfigHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.config.ConfigHandler

  • public class ConfigHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A handler for json configurations

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_CONFIG

      Loads a custom config.

      Loads an entry of the configuration

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_CONFIG

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_CONFIG
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getDefault

        public static ConfigHandler getDefault()
        Loads a default configuration. The default configuration should be placed relative to the program in /config/system_config.json
        Returns:
        a handler for the default configuration

      • createCustom

        public static ConfigHandler createCustom(java.lang.String name)
        Loads a custom config. It will look for a file: ./config/%name%.json You can preload configs from custom locations with injectCustomConfig.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the configuration
        Returns:
        a handler for the custom configuration

      • injectCustomConfig

        public static void injectCustomConfig(java.lang.String name,
                                      java.nio.file.Path p)
        Injects a custom config from a custom location.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the configuration
        p - location of the configuration

      • getConfig

        public <T> T getConfig(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Loads an entry of the configuration
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type
        Parameters:
        name - name of the object
        clazz - class of the object
        Returns:
        a object which is deserialized to the given type

      • getConfig

        public <T> T getConfig(java.lang.String name,
                       T defaultObj)
        Same as getConfig for a class type but will return a default value if the config cannot be handled.
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type
        Parameters:
        name - name of the object
        defaultObj - default return value
        Returns:
        a object which is deserialized to the given type or default value
